attributes.action: End the BBC licence fee , BBC demands money with menaces , threaten's people
attributes.additional_details: Forcing people to fund media has no place in modern times , there are many choices of media in this age , and being force to pay for media we don't want is not fair to people , how the government have allowed this to continue for so long is scandalous , demanding money with menaces has no place in a democratic country
attributes.background: The people of britain have had enough of the BBC and are being forced to pay for something they do not want , BBC demand money with menaces, threatening court action , one thousand pound fine and legal fee's , this is not acceptable , reminds me of mafia
